thread.title: How the AP-GfK poll on Democratic candidates was conducted
thread.title_full: How the AP-GfK poll on Democratic candidates was conducted - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: How the AP-GfK poll on Democratic candidates was conducted
text: The Associated Press-GfK poll on the Democratic presidential candidates was conducted by GfK Public Affairs and Corporate Communications October 15-19. With a probability basis and coverage of people who otherwise couldn't access the Internet, online surveys using KnowledgePanel are nationally representative. ...
